segments.text: I see the water pouring out of the sink, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in the middle of it, but she doesn’t seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is getting soaked, and the floor is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just ignoring it or if she’s really that focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin everything if it keeps going like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should probably say something, but I don’t want to startle her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just too much to handle.
segments.speaker: PAR
